title.name: (1) New
title.short-description: A winter storm dumped snow from Texas all the way to Boone, North Carolina, where JoAnna Wayt's dad dressed up as 'The Grinch' to plow the snow out of their driveway.
title.long-description: Dec 11, 2018; 7:00 AM ET A winter storm dumped snow from Texas all the way to Boone, North Carolina, where JoAnna Wayt's dad dressed up as 'The Grinch' to plow the snow out of their driveway.
title.custom-enum-value: 'The Grinch' helps plow snow covered driveway
A winter storm dumped snow from Texas all the way to Boone, North Carolina, where JoAnna Wayt's dad dressed up as 'The Grinch' to plow the snow out of their driveway.
